pr_title: Filter mtas by space id as well as mta id

timeline.bodyText: I'd prefer passing the space GUID in addition to the MTA ID, instead of passing the context, since the context is just a map of variables. It's like passing everything to this method and allowing it to change it.
timeline.author: nictas

timeline.message:
Filter mtas by space id as well as mta id

When updating configuration subscriptions, mtas must be filtered by
space id as well, otherwise it would break mtas with same mta id in
different spaces.
